name: @vkammerer/webworker-postmessage
description: A small layer on top of postMessage to improve performance with web workers

scripts.lib: node_modules/.bin/webpack src/index.js lib/index.js --module-bind babel-loader --output-library webworker-postmessage  --output-library-target umd

author: Vincent Kammerer <vkammerer@gmail.com> (http://vincent-kammerer.com)
